{{Description|A claw-snapping crab that can be found in various water bodies throughout Teyvat.<br />The shells of these crabs are painted in many beautiful red shades, which wonderfully reflect the many stages of sunlight. They look especially good cooked.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Sun Crab''' is a type of crab which can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Crab|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
